website_summaries.verdict: D-Link's Network Cam functions as a cheap option for checking in on your home, but without consistent or useful alerts, it's a poor choice for smart-home security.
pros: The live feed works well with capable panning and tilting that you can control remotely
cons: Alerts don't work well and the recorded video doesn't work at all

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE! D-LINK NO LONGER SUPPORTS THESE AS OF JUNE 1, 2019
customer_reviews.text: I am updating my review to caution buyers that D-Link has discontinued this specific model. So if you have any trouble and need tech support, you will have to pay a pretty penny for it. Not worth it! So pay a little extra and buy a more recent model that comes unlimited tech support.
customer_reviews.author: Amzn Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this model
customer_reviews.text: Trust the reviews and look elsewhere. I have 6 of the DCS-5020L cameras and while they are not HD cameras, they look and stream infinitely better than this 5222L. It can only stream at around 3 frames per second in 720p. This is not a network issue. In low quality, it streams ok, but who buys an HD camera to stream in the lowest quality. Lastly, although my D-Link "Main Console" app on Windows shows that it supports the DCS-5222L, and it DOES perfectly support all functions on my 5020L's, it will not detect the DCS-5222L. So, again... do yourself a favor and get anything other than this model. This should lead to a class action lawsuit.
customer_reviews.author: AllThingsTech

customer_reviews.title: Could be better- seeking a replacement
customer_reviews.text: Had frustrating experience with initial install. Had to have 45 minute chat conversation with D-Link to establish connection to my network, and I am not using Wi-Fi, its connected via Ethernet straight to my router. Low light video quality is barely acceptable. Need brightly lit room (sunlight) to get quality color video. Digital zoom is grainy. Maybe for businesses with good lighting, this would be okay, but for home, it could be better; should not need to leave all the lights on to get quality video. We will be replacing once I find the right camera.
customer_reviews.author: T. Huber

customer_reviews.title: This  camera is subject to attack attempts by hackers all over the world - Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Once I received my new Modem from my internet provider and logged into the app that came with it, I found out that this camera was subjected to hundreds of access attempts from hackers all over the world. After days and hours on the phone with my internet provider and D-Link each pointing fingers at the other, I was forced to return it as a financial loss. It should be noted that even though this was purchased as "New" I found out that this camera has been discontinued for years and is no longer supported by D-Link.
customer_reviews.author: JodiRealtor

customer_reviews.title: Between 1-3 years the wireless connection fails in many DLink cameras
customer_reviews.text: I've owned five of these cameras since 2012. 932L, 5010L, 5020L and the same issue arises with all of them. After a while (anywhere between 1 and 3 years for me) the WIFI quits working. It will say there is Link: No in the wireless config despite being fully online and useable from the GUI while wired. It's like the WIFI chip burns out or something. One day it'll be fine, then all of a sudden it will refuse to establish a link to the wireless network. I moved to Wansview after dealing with this and I've had those for a few years with zero problems. I will never buy another DLink product.
customer_reviews.author: Kephart

customer_reviews.title: Works great, no issues
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I don’t see what the fuss is about. I just received a B2 version, the latest. As with any product, the first step is to plug in and update the firmware. Easy. Wireless setup was easy. Control (pan and tilt) is easy with the mydlink lite app, both iOS and Android. View can be high res or low. Color is good in light, and in no light the infrared works too, though grainy. I have not tried the micro sd card, 2-way voice or recording yet. Listening is fine, as it is with all my other (more basic) dlink cameras.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL MCGREW

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY Support and software are discontinued as of 8/2020
customer_reviews.text: Ive owned the camera for many yrs and like it other than its a bit slow to check videos. Earlier this year the app you use to check vidoes was no longer compatible with Chrome and I guess we can work around that. But today 6/9/2020, I recd an email stating that all support and software updates will be discontinued as of 8/2020. Shame on them for continuing to sell a product that they know will be discontinued in 2 mns and more so that they discontinue to support a camera that many are still using. I will NEVER BUY THIS BRAND AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Scott and Sam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Dog-sitter
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a relative to monitor dogs behavior when they were not home. Mounted outside under an eve to protect from outside elements (this is not waterproof so it will probably get ruined). Setup is the same as any of the D-Link DCS cameras and can be configured using the free phone app (MyDlink) and/or accessing it locally on your network via the IP address. Has both a microphone and a speaker so you can yell at the dog to stop chewing on the fence and/or hear Rex when he's barking at a butterfly.
customer_reviews.author: Frest0n

customer_reviews.title: It has been an awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased a 5020 for my newborn's room three years ago. It worked so well I purchased another one a year later for my son's room. Setup is a little clunky and the app is pretty straight forward. I wouldn't use the wifi extender as i never received a great connection from them. Just buy a decent router. Sadly I'm trying to get my house to 5.0GHz only due to some wireless bridging i'm trying to do, so i must buy some 5.0GHz compatible cameras. These only connect 2.4GHz. All-in-all, for the money, you can't beat this little guy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bojarski

customer_reviews.title: Unit arrived Dead on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on Amazon and got a "refurbished" model that was DoA. I didn't pay close enough attention so that was on me for buying it refurb'd. However when I went to a retail store and bought a replacement that one was dead as well, so who knows. Poor manufacturing/ quality control, which surprised and disappointed me since I have had the older model of this unit for years without issue. I may try a third unit, but I'll wait for the right price before I do. One star for two failed units. Maybe the third time will change my mind and rating
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Frustration!
customer_reviews.text: Frustration! So this is what a 'refurbished' cam works like? It has given me nothing but frustration for 3 days trying to set it up. And I have a lot of experience setting up DLink cameras; I have 12 working fine but this one will never connect wirelessly and I have tried everything, resets, changing the IP, etc., and nothing works. Avoid this cam! It's being sent back tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Nergo Pthycc

customer_reviews.title: Really Happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use and I feel so much better being able to watch my kids regardless of what room I'm it. We don't have a big house at all but there are times we can't be everywhere at once and this actually allows me to do that. I have one in the living rm and one in my 2 year old son's room. It really has made it easier to do chores around the house and it just gives us piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera but Difficult Setup
customer_reviews.text: Purchase one for the house and it was very difficult to get operational. The setup is the most difficult I have come across. I needed one for our vacation home and thought since I had done the setup once it wouldn't be as difficult. Wrong. This one was even worse and I spent 30 minutes on the phone with tech support with no success. They told me it must be defective (not sure that was the case or just bad tech support). I just returned it and did not order another. Good camera but way to hard to set up.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: however I finally got it set up and I love it, it works wonderfully after the difficulty of ...
customer_reviews.text: i would have given 5 stars but upon purchase and set up in which I was having difficulty with, I contacted dlink customer service to find out this particular model is obsolete and no longer available for assistance unless I want to pay a fee for customer service. however I finally got it set up and I love it, it works wonderfully after the difficulty of set up. therefore if you can get past the set up it works great, i use it to watch my lil guy while he sleeps (hes just a baby and i did not like the baby dlink it does not rotate as this one does)
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: At first I was a little bummed because I thought i needed a laptop or desktop to set it up, but after seeing that I could use my mobile, it was extremely easy to set up and has a tremendous picture quality and receptiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Sean R. Hale

customer_reviews.title: The advertised features appear great on this camera
customer_reviews.text: The advertised features appear great on this camera, but it is finicky with connecting remotely. It is frustrating to be away from home and try to see your house and get an error. If you want easy and reliability, buy one of thier stand-alones that don't move.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: It works great for my needs and does exactly what it says ...
customer_reviews.text: It works great for my needs and does exactly what it says it does. The only thing missing, that I'm aware of, is the ability to save to disk or DVR. I also wish the mobile app maintained connection. It seems to time out within 5 minutes and I have to reconnect. Overall though, it works very wellI really like that I can set views and automatically have it switch to that view just by choosing one of the preset I define.
customer_reviews.author: F. Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Great cameras for a decent price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic camera that just seems to work. Some minor issues with initial configuration and their app. Went to manual config and had them setup in minutes. Works great with the Qnap Nas for video recording, SmartThings for remote tracking and management, and with their IOS and Android apps for mobile access. Only wish the internal speaker was louder.
customer_reviews.author: Mlabelle

customer_reviews.title: Over 6 years outdoors and still going.
customer_reviews.text: This has been mounted under the eve outside the house, in northern MN (+100 to -40 degrees) year round and it still works and moves like it should. Figured I'd just come back and leave a review for those asking about it's sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: D-Link and Smartthings customer support
customer_reviews.text: This item shipped with a mark D POS REPLEN. It seems like the package was previously opened. This item will not pair with Smartthings even though it is recommended. It will not also pair with the the manufacturer's app either via Ethernet or wifi. This item is replacing my Nexia system. I think smartthings app is very good - but pairing 3rd party devices is not as good as Nexia. The customer service of Smartthings is very poor. You have to communicate with them by email and they immediately responded that they are inundated with service calls.
customer_reviews.author: jagjr

customer_reviews.title: Camera 5020L email alert with photos problem
customer_reviews.text: The camera 5020L HW seems very good, good colors and clear, easy to control for rotations. However, the resolution is not 720P (as stated in Amazon) but 480P (confirmed with D Link supporter). Most important to me is it's email with photo/video clips can't be set to work, even I worked with D Link supporter, it still failed to work. My gmail sent me a message to warn the app (D Link) "doesn't meet modern security standards" and "Sign-in attempt prevented". I use Windows 10 with Norton Security. Not sure if someone has such experiece to solve the problem and share with me. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: ssu

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the first month, than when connected to the app, it was impossible to set/control it. One month later the streaming was grabbed with a pink filter, horrible to watch it It costs the double of q Chinese cam and it's worst than it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Maria

customer_reviews.title: it works great over Wifi (Remote & Local)
customer_reviews.text: It takes some time to open the app and load the connection, but other than that, it works great over Wifi (Remote & Local). The motion detection feature is why I got it, and that works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: OK at first, but having some issue after a few months
customer_reviews.text: The firmware has improved on this camera, but it it still difficult to set up. More importantly, the motion detection has stopped emailing (or FTPing, or anything other than logging the fact that motion was detected. This was working well in place and I performed a firmware update. That is when it lost the ability to take action after motion. Otherwise this is a good PTZ camera. It does occasionally complain about the SD card, but it has consistently recorded to the card for several months now.
customer_reviews.author: rfab

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second camera I purchased from this brand. D-Link has a large line of safety cameras at reasonable prices. This one with tilt/rotate gives a better view of a wider area. Setup is user friendly IF you follow their directions. Picture and sound quality is excellent and remote controls are smooth. For the nontechnical buyer, this is user friendly. I highly recommend this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: J. Owens

customer_reviews.title: I can pull up the image remotely and control the camera and it looks fine. But when trying to configure the camera
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple other D-Link cameras and have not had a problem. But this one for some reason, wants to give me grief. I can pull up the image remotely and control the camera and it looks fine. But when trying to configure the camera, I am unable to see the image. I've reached out to DLink but they are slow to respond, so by the time they did, I was not a position to work on it. I'll reach out again when I have time and I feel like DLink will be responsive. I'm just a little disappointed that this camera isn't as easy to configure as my others have been.
customer_reviews.author: DL Graziadei

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Camera is very easy to install. This is my 4th Dlink camera in the last 2+ yes. All 4 are working great.
customer_reviews.author: Lefty

customer_reviews.title: The quality is pretty good, even in night vision mode
customer_reviews.text: This is a neat little gadget. I use it to keep tabs on my house when I am not at home. Once you set it up on your wireless or wired home network, you can log in and view remotely from your cell phone. The quality is pretty good, even in night vision mode. My only complaint is the lag when you pan or tilt it remotely. By itself, it only allows for viewing. If you want to record what you are watching you will need a separate DVR unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had an issue setting up my DCS-5020L after I ...
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue setting up my DCS-5020L after I moved to a different location. I had to call tech support to get help as setting the camera thru the IOS APP did not work to register my camera to MyDlink website.. When called tech support I technician Randy B # AR004232 answered my service call and helped me set up my camera using the correct setup wizard he was pleasant and helpful.. He also help me set up my wireless connection and everything finished successfully. Thanks DLINK Tech Support.
customer_reviews.author: ScaleMan

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to hook up and you can sync it to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second surveillance camera that I've tried to keep an eye on my dogs. It was very easy to hook up and you can sync it to your wi-fi without a cable. Not all of the functions work properly (I cannot hear or speak through the camera) but I haven't investigated any means of fixing that issue. It's also small and discrete and reconnects immediately if we lose power.
customer_reviews.author: Kourtni CK

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT WILL NOT WORK AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: This was a "like new" product. I worked and worked with it (and I have 6 other same/similar DLink cameras). It simply will not set up with home WIFI. Sadly I went on vacation and forgot to return it within the date so that's all on me. Take a PASS on this one should you be considering it. It will not work!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wasted 2 hours on this
customer_reviews.text: I could not get this to work. I tried to connect wirelessly, wired, from my laptop, desktop, etc. but nothing worked. I tried to connect to my Amped range extender - didn't work. I tried to connect directly to the Comcast router - no luck. I scanned and scanned, but the unit continually blinked green and never gave me a solid green. This tells me it could never connect. I wasted 2 hours on this, and sent it back. Maybe I got a bad unit? UPDATE: I bought a ''Samsung SmartCam HD Pro 1080p Full-HD Wi-Fi Camera'' and it was up and running in 5 minutes! Buy the Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: Freya

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Product
customer_reviews.text: I have a DLink 5222L and it is of good quality. I ordered another one and the package says it is a DLink 5222L but the camera is a DLink 5222LB1 which is of poorer quality. I have recently found out from DLink that the DLink 5222L has been discontinued. I find that Amazon selling this as a DLink 5222L is very deceiving.
customer_reviews.author: Georgina OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT Record
customer_reviews.text: The camera itself works great. It took longer than I expected to set it up on our wireless network, but works fine now. I thought I had researched this model thoroughly before purchasing it. I just assumed that because you could view it remotely you could record the video. Nope. Not this model. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Kudzu Music

customer_reviews.title: Review DCS 5020L
customer_reviews.text: I gave this camera a "liked it" because of the mild distortion (curvature) in the picture. The camera works fine, however, expect motor noise when panning and stepping not smooth motion . However, in an effort to be objective the camera met all my needs. I use this camera to monitor my remote astronomical observatory. The night vision capability works well for me (9' x 12' observatory space'). I can only recommend this camera to those who understand that you get what you pay for and have similar needs like mine. One final note you must manually focus the camera lens, there is no auto focus capability.
customer_reviews.author: Nemesis77

customer_reviews.title: Great camera to spy on toddler, but a little too big
customer_reviews.text: I use this camera to check on my daughter throughout the day. I have a few other less expensive D-Link cameras in other parts of the house and this one is by far my favorite. It’s a little bit clunky and much bigger than other cameras, so minus 1 star for the size. Aside from the camera being larger than what I would like, no complaints. We are happy with this one and will eventually replace the other cameras in the house with this model.
customer_reviews.author: Kg

customer_reviews.title: So good I bought two!
customer_reviews.text: For safety and security, this is a must have! It has an app that works on your phone. I can go out of state and I can still see what's going on where the camera is placed.
customer_reviews.author: bluejoie

customer_reviews.title: MAJOR PAIN TO SET UP
customer_reviews.text: Update: I first gave the product 2 stars. My mistake. After using the product for two weeks, I can wholeheartedly give it 1 star. TRY DROPCAM INSTEAD. That is an amazing product. I bought one, set it up in less than five minutes, and the quality is fantastic. After only 4 hours with two technical service personnel, after two online downloads to update from the included software, and after switching to a different router I have an fair to good picture. Great concept that was put out there a little too soon to be idiot proof enough for guys like me.
customer_reviews.author: John Huff

customer_reviews.title: Don't know how I lived without this camera!
customer_reviews.text: Besides for security purposes, I love this camera. I am disabled and all of my friends and family come to the side door of my home where I sit. Typically only strangers or the postal service and Amazon deliveries of course only go to my front door. This camera makes it very easy for me to answer the door and see who is at the door. If it is a sales person I can send them on their way or if I need to go to the door I am able to tell the person to be patient and I will be there.
customer_reviews.author: Canya62

customer_reviews.title: works great!!
customer_reviews.text: love this camera. I purchased 2 one for my home in the u.s. the other for my home in Cozumel mexico. I am not a computer person but this camera was very easy to install, setup and view. I get my motion or sound alert and click on my app on the iphone and see real time video right on my phone....love this item. wish they had an outdoor model that was around the same price as this one or a weather cover to protect it while under a carport. (I worry that the salty air in Cozumel will effect the camera but so far so good) everyone that sees my camera seem very impressed I know I am....
customer_reviews.author: Dawn clay

customer_reviews.title: Good basic cameras.
customer_reviews.text: For the price these Are great cameras. I have mostly dcs932l thru out the house, but I have 3 of these that cover larger areas with the pan and tilt.
customer_reviews.author: Loren S. Young

customer_reviews.title: just ok, pretty much like the other reviews
customer_reviews.text: installation was NOT simple, lots of hoop jumping to get it going. Once the camera was on and connected to the app for viewing it was starting to look like fun. Then the shortcomings started to appear. no recording (without additional equipment), very choppy movement from the app have to tap the arrow for small movement and keep tapping to get where you want to see, I have not figure out how to get it to view out a window that has a screen, all we see is the screen. So far this seems it can only be used to view inside unless you have a window without a screen.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Adding to the network.
customer_reviews.text: I’m always leery purchasing refurbished items but the price was right to get 2 for the price of 1 new. All worked as expected adding to my WiFi network. Really like this style and even though they don’t say outdoor rated, I have 5 mounted under the eve of the house for 2 years with no issues. Great for peace of mind to check on things when away from home.
customer_reviews.author: Tim M.

customer_reviews.title: Software kills hardware
customer_reviews.text: The camera quality is great, but it's gone to complete waste coz of the software. Keeps getting disconnected! you cannot watch your house for a full 1 minute without it disconnecting... I'll definitely be trying other brands as this is a rookie's mistake, even with all the updates they've done, it's still really really bad software. the web access and the App.
customer_reviews.author: Hadi X

customer_reviews.title: Good to use if your on the same network. Otherwise good luck.
customer_reviews.text: D-link sucks!!! I purchased these cameras to watch my uncle's property, while we get it sold. Set up is easy and cameras are decent for the price. Its the cloud service that is awful. I have been unable to view the property with my computer. I have tried both chrome and explorer to view. The problem is on D-link's side. So I use the app on my phone. Now I got a motion detection on my outside camera, but cant see what it is because of a max view error. So thanks D-link for absolutly nothing. Never buying D-link brand anything.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas L. Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Fits the bill
customer_reviews.text: Purchased so that I could monitor my dogs when I'm at work. It does that very well. Was very easy to set up. Picture quality is good. I'm able to monitor remotely from my phone. I can pan and tilt remotely from phone or computer. this camera actually fell about 6 feet when I had it setup. I mounted it to a flexible tripod and my son wrapped it around a column. Obviously didn't do a good job of it and it fell down. Camera kept on functioning without a problem. Very happy with this item. Only problem so far is it is a little slow to pan and tilt when using phone.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: The camera cannot pair with the app. I followed ...
customer_reviews.text: The camera cannot pair with the app. I followed the instruction to download mi home app. Point the camera to the QR code. Hear the voice prompt saying the QR code is read. But then it says the QR code is invalid. Therefore, I cannot pair my phone with the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Slawomir Przybylowicz

customer_reviews.title: Failed firmware update will brick the unit!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to use as a puppy cam to watch my dogs to make sure they are not getting into trouble. This is a complete POS. I unpacked it got it connected the thing timed out at least 5 times trying to "test internet". Finally once it connected and logged in to mydlink.com, it said an update was needed then it just stopped working. Reading some forums it seems a failed firmware upgrade will brick the unit completely....it's not worth it's weight in plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Cam software less than great the cam picture pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: This does not go in easy.. They need to do more work on the install and recognition of cam Mac-id , it worked better under xp some what, the main consol I could not get set up on ether pc with Xp or Win7.. They need updates for thiis type of install. I got the camera working in the moble aps after a one time shot at instll on an old XP machine..Not sure ehat the problem is.. I could not get the capture on the card when in the camera to take a snap shot and save it to the card.. The picures look great now if only the software would work in sysnc with the machines I have.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Dbean

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera, Annoying Click from Night Mode.
customer_reviews.text: The Camera works great, Software on Mobile (Android) sometimes crashes when selecting preset PTZ points. Only thing i do not like is the IR filter on the Infrared when it switches to Night Mode. It makes a large audible click that sometimes cycles on & off when in Auto mode watching TV in my living room just by the changing light conditions from the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan F

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this thing! I gave it to him as a gift last Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: New York Barney

customer_reviews.title: 5 minutes is the maximum viewing time.
customer_reviews.text: After 5 minutes, there is a "timeout" requiring you to send a resume command. Not very useful for security monitoring. Configuration was difficult and requires constant maintenance After several hours, I was able to configure 2 cameras. If you are ever able to get the camera configured, the camera works quite well. But re-sending a "Resume" command every 5 minutes is a part time job.
customer_reviews.author: Skyhawk

customer_reviews.title: Bought 4 of these. Able to view, hear ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 of these. Able to view, hear & control through D-Link app. Gives clear daylight picture, somewhat grainy in dark but still can see. Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Sza

customer_reviews.title: DCS-5222L is NOT a HD webcam
customer_reviews.text: I've used D-Link DCS-932 webcams before and liked them because they performed well for the low price (~$45), but video resolution was not so great. So decided to 'upgrade' to the DCS-5222L HD. Big mistake for two reasons: 1) video resolution of camera was no better than before 2) vendor (Five 4) sent used camera (with previous owner's setup still installed!). Glad I got my money back from Amazon. Amcrest is way better, for less money, and has true HD with pan, tilt AND ZOOM! (and works with 3rd party IP Cam Viewer app). Will never buy or recommend a D-Link webcam again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Day

customer_reviews.title: Good reliable camera, useful night vision and mic
customer_reviews.text: Works well, good range of motion. The night vision works very well and also has good range. The included abilities such as scheduling and motion detection work well with a bit of tweaking. It plays pretty well with diskstation. The mic is extremely sensitive, picking up the sound of bubbles in an aquarium from 18 ft away. When connected wirelessly, it sometimes fails to register if there is a power failure at the router.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Started good, ended bad.
customer_reviews.text: At first I did like it and the mounting options were versatile and the features were nice how the infrared lights work at night are great. If you want to use it wired it might be a good choice but most people, including myself want to use it via wireless. That said it has been less than a year and the wireless part has stopped working. I tried reinstalling it and resetting it and nothing. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Gonz

customer_reviews.title: D-Stink
customer_reviews.text: Does not work well with any of their handheld device apps. Does not work well with any of the laptop apps. Difficult if not impossible to set motion detection zone. Difficult if not impossible to playback recorded video via web browser or app. Live view is choppy, and times out after 90 seconds. Customer support never responded to my E-Mail. I would have returned it if it wasn't already past the return deadline. I think I might make a video of me destroying it, setting it on fire, and then putting it out after my morning coffee... and then post it here as a warning to stay away from this thing.
customer_reviews.author: HonestReviews

customer_reviews.title: Another Great D-Link Camera
customer_reviews.text: Just bought one of these to add to my other D-Link cameras in my home security system. Excellent and easy quick setup, great night vision and love the ability to pan the camera around and up and down. Presets work great, not only from my PC, but also from the Windows app on my Nokia phone. I am ordering another right now as price is lower than I have ever seen it.
customer_reviews.author: SFL

customer_reviews.title: So-So Reliability
customer_reviews.text: This camera was very easy to setup. After that, it won't stay on line more than 2 days at a time. I have to reset this camera every other day! It may be faulty!
customer_reviews.author: Railman302

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I had modest expectations for the D-Link Wireless Pan & Tilt Surveillance Camera, especially considering its relative low price. Setup was reasonably straighforward. The WPS protected setup worked like a charm for me and I was up and running in about 15 minutes. I actually had more problems setting up my D-Link account than the actual installation. As far as performance is concerned, I was pleasantly surprised. Picture quality its quite good and audio, while not great, is more than sufficient. The night vision feature works excellently. Remote monitoring on an iPhone or iPad via the internet was quite good. All in all, the unit exceeded my expectations. I am considering buying a second one to monitor another room.
customer_reviews.author: L. Schuman

customer_reviews.title: This camera is awesome! We have 2 of the simple stationary cameras ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera is awesome! We have 2 of the simple stationary cameras and decided to get this to give us a more comprehensive view. The night vision is very helpful and the camera is easily maneuvered via the app.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cameras, don't get them from this company
customer_reviews.text: These cameras worked great once I bought them from somewhere else. The ones I got from this company didn't work. I spend hours trying to get them to work and hours on the phone with the camera customer service people only to find out that I got bad ones. One of the cameras wasn't even new and I found recordings of another family on it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, as long as it's not from China
customer_reviews.text: We love these cameras, but MAKE SURE THEY ARE FROM THE USA. We got sent some from China by a third party seller and spent hours trying to figure out why it didn't work. ifyiu see any Chinese writing on the box, return it immediately. I figured they were still compatible but they aren't. Customer service is pointless unless you get to a level two tech. After we got to someone intelligent the issue was easily identifiable.
customer_reviews.author: Kris S.

customer_reviews.title: started strong for a year but ultimately failed
customer_reviews.text: the camera was great for a year but now will not turn off the IR lights, now therefore it washes the image so that you cannot tell any colors, grass looks white and whites look purple. loved it for a long time but now its hardly usable.
customer_reviews.author: WeOwnTheSea

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Security Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazing. I really enjoy the fact that you can feel safe not only when in your home but even when you are away through the app on your phone. This is my first purchase as far as security cameras go, but I do have family who have purchased this camera and it has worked for them for years now. D-Link Systems have even more to offer then just this camera. They sell amazing products.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M

customer_reviews.title: If I can do it, YOU can too!
customer_reviews.text: DCS-5020L: A friend installed this technically challenged consumer. The following day-9/5/15- I received over 100 emails, even though the settings said it was not "enabled". I called the 24/7 toll free no.: 877 453-5465. The technician, JOSEPH #AR00420419, was a delight to work with and understand. The poor guy had to explain every detail as to where to find the Serial Numbers, etc; and once computer on, what to click on in Settings; and assured me there was no rush (since it all looked like mud to me). Not only did this all work; JOSEPH also helped me figure out the easiest way to delete the million emails! Amen. Nancy (ref 6733147), a more confident consumer!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install for great Peace of Mind!
customer_reviews.text: The camera was easy to set-up and has given me piece of mind as I can now see what is happening in my home remotely while I travel. I am not as technically savvy as I would like, and was worried that this may be difficult to install, but it was relatively easy and took about 30 minutes to complete. I will be purchasing and installing a few other cameras in my home in the next week, along with the video recording option.
customer_reviews.author: Erika D

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Surveillance Camera...Very Good Performance
customer_reviews.text: I have used these D-Link cameras for about a year now. They were easy to install and have been very reliable. I use them to remotely monitor both my primary home and second home when I am away. The mobile app works great in managing the cameras. Video quality is good and low light performance is acceptable. Looking forward to the integration of these cameras with home automation systems such as Smartthings.
customer_reviews.author: Big John

customer_reviews.title: Good, reliable camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these cameras to monitor things in two residences. They work very well and, best of all, reset themselves after power outages. Some other cameras don’t reset. Image quality is good enough to monitor inside and outside conditions.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lord

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, app is as great, way better than my compro cameras which are not no longer in business.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and love the local recording
customer_reviews.text: I had two before this and added to my set. Easy setup and love the local recording.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great D-Link Camera
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered on time and works great, just like my other DCS 5020L D-Link Cameras. Support is also a great help when you run into problems that you can't solve.
customer_reviews.author: Herb Reed

customer_reviews.title: Using the easy to follow Set Up Wizzard on the MAC
customer_reviews.text: This camera works very well for it's price. Using the easy to follow Set Up Wizzard on the MAC, I had it up and on my account in 10 minutes. The video quality is not HD, but better than the other MyDlink cams ( 942 & 930) that I have. The pan goes about 320 degrees around, and the tilt goes about 130 degrees. The mount is much stronger than the other cams too. Night (black & White) is as good as can be expected. Sound is fine too.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Y.

customer_reviews.title: The camera constantly dumps offline while I'm away and sends ...
customer_reviews.text: The camera constantly dumps offline while I'm away and sends erroneous email alerts of the offline status. Once offline, the camera will not take input from either remote or local log-ins. This is troublesome since enabling the motion detection allows the camera to capture actions on the memory card that cannot be stopped for the inability to disable the motion sensing.
customer_reviews.author: Huntsman6x6

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works very good, software made it all come together. We tried other cameras but the software was user unfriendly!
customer_reviews.author: R J

customer_reviews.title: boosts Wifi and provides excellent view and sound
customer_reviews.text: Works well, boosts Wifi and provides excellent view and sound.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Guion

customer_reviews.title: I'm goin back to the D-Link Pan & Tilt Wi-Fi Camera (DCS-5009L) it is great! I thought a newer version would be better ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of this version considering returning it. Does not see anything at night and if the sun is shining in it's direction the video is completely white. I'm goin back to the D-Link Pan & Tilt Wi-Fi Camera (DCS-5009L) it is great! I thought a newer version would be better but I was very wrong!
customer_reviews.author: RobKeem

customer_reviews.title: Good, could be faster response
customer_reviews.text: I like this camera it is far more stable than another brand I had. However there is a lag in connecting that other D-Link cameras do not seem to suffer from. I have two other D-Link cameras that display almost as soon as I click to view.
customer_reviews.author: KWG

customer_reviews.title: Watch Your World Remotely!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for my application. If there is a draw back it is the fact that a firmware update is mandatary. Angle of view is very good and with the pan tilt feature you can scan the entire room. The picture is good but not terribly crisp.
customer_reviews.author: Night Nemesis

customer_reviews.title: The technology for these types of cameras is not ready for consumers
customer_reviews.text: After spending several hours updating the firmware on this device, I finally got it connected to the d-link cloud. Furthermore, the applications and lag to control these devices are several YEARS behind in technology and the result is a glitchy lagging picture and performance for camera rotation. the best piece came from some 3rd party apps that let you bookmark locations to point the camera, forget manually moving it around unless you have the patience to sit there and mess with it for 10 minutes to point at something specific. Bottom Line: NOT FOR BEGINNERS OR TECHNICALLY CHALLENGED, TECHNOLOGY NEEDS TO MATURE.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this to monitor our recently rescued dog while crate training. So while I'm at work, I can log into my camera and see what my dog is doing. If he's laying down great! If he is restless and whining or trying to bite at the side of the crate I can talk through this camera and tell him to stop and lay down (which he does) and this assists me in keeping him safe and sound. Good boy!!! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Patty W.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price paid
customer_reviews.text: is an excellent security camera, whenever you have a home alarm, but has motion sensors are very sensitive to light. this model also has a repeater, but it's pretty bad, and it only works when the camera is connected wirelessly. if you need an IP camera with motion, this is the best option for the price. easy to set up. inmagen quality is good and the night-vision led for much help, can observe from a mobile application and this service free to users.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time on a faulty product (will update if Round #2 isn't a dud also)
customer_reviews.text: Worked on setting it up for two hours and then called D-Link for 45 minutes of technical support. Product deemed defective. Always fun to deal with the hassle upfront and burn a number of hours on something that was faulty to begin with. Doesn't sound like I'm the only one. May reorder and spend less time on it before calling support and update the review.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Love the security.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. We use it to check in on our cats during feeding times while we are away on vacation to make sure the food hopper went off. I can look at them on my phone or hubby on his phone. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Petters

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera, but a bit buggy
customer_reviews.text: Have issues connecting remotely quite often. The camera itself is great, but the remote access is not reliable. The recording is also difficult to setup, and also has reliability issues. I have had to reboot this camera many times to restore remote access and recording
customer_reviews.author: Man_4_Sail

customer_reviews.title: poor image quality
customer_reviews.text: Even after rotating the camera lens to adjust the focus, still not good image quality. too grainy, which won't change with focus. I have two 932L cameras and they are both better than this device. PROS: setup was relatively easy if you follow the written directions. Pan is nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Low cost leader
customer_reviews.text: Its cheap. The app usually works. Zooming ruins resolution. D-Link has not responded to Krack virus much on cameras, so I run it wired.
customer_reviews.author: r

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: This item does not come with the needed setup disc any longer, the mobile app for set up must have a QR code only found on newer devices. The item looked ready to use but the programming for set up is inadequate. This item will not be supported after August 8th 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This thing works as advertised. It pans and tilts well, the night vision is very good. Remote use and viewing is very easy to set up. It uses an adapter for power, so you have to keep that in mind when you set it up. I was not expecting high definition flawless video, as a security/monitoring device the resolution is satisfactory. I am going to buy two more for other areas.
customer_reviews.author: Topwatch

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: The interface on this is really slow. It's not a bad camera, but it's not great either. I would try a different camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jaromexxxx

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do most of what it says it does
customer_reviews.text: Product is a dud. All the camera angles are fuzzy. The "panning" is super choppy. There's a permanent dark spot in the middle of the field of view. The remote doesn't work. Please contact me to arrange for a functional replacement and I will be happy to update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for viewing health care providers at dementia father's house. Motion activated, can hear and communicate through it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda holmes

customer_reviews.title: Video and audio seems very glitchy and delayed. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Video and audio seems very glitchy and delayed. I got clearer picture on a cheap $20 knockoff from China.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera and does all it says.
customer_reviews.text: Just received the camera,i am very impressed with it,would have been nice to include a cd because you physically have to find the right version number and model from the bottom of camera.Other then that works great and can hear and speak through the microphone so if someone is in my house i can say the cops have been called,i am buying the micro sd card and overall its worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN SCHOLTES

customer_reviews.title: No two-way speaker to respond to what you hear.
customer_reviews.text: I like the D-Link cameras but unfortunately I thought this one had the feature of being able to not only hear what's going on in the room but being able to respond verbally and it doesn't. By the time I figured out how to use it and needed that function my deadline to return it had passed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: This product is crap!! It took over 6-hours to get the ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is crap!! It took over 6-hours to get the Wifi to connect. Not the quick-and-easy setup they described. Had two different versions of the product, which you couldn't tell until the first set-up didn't work, and it sent you through the diagnostics. Then....after getting it to connect. Then the damn product wouldn't recognize the mini SD card. So frustrating!! And of course no reply from customer support. However, the good news? ...it is being returned, so it can find another home...if you are brave enough to order it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Would not work with my Acer computer. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: D. Darnell

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work properly, image is totally blurry, useless. I have purchased 5 of this, two does not worked and returned. Your chances? 50%.🤦🏻‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: Sergio C.

customer_reviews.title: I was assisted by techician AR004624 at Dlink and he did an excellent job in helping me to set up the camera ...
customer_reviews.text: I was just about to ship this product back to the seller (printed the return labels)when I just happen to run across the DLink technical support phone number (8774535465). I could not that toll free number before on google, but by chance got in when googling today. I was assisted by techician AR004624 at Dlink and he did an excellent job in helping me to set up the camera for email forwarding of my camera snapshots. I loved this DCS 5222LB1 at first sight. Now, I really love my camera more. Thank you Dlink.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Queen

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm not very tech savvy, so I was a bit worried about installing this. Once I went to the website and downloaded the installation software it was a very simple process. You MUST make sure you are downloading the software for the product you purchased, there are different models and if you pick the wrong one it won't work. I bought this because my husband works nights and was worried about me and our newborn being home alone all night. So we placed the camera above the bassinet and now my hubby can look in on him.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna F

product_meta.title: D-Link Pan & Tilt Wi-Fi Camera (DCS-5020L),White
product_meta.description: Style:Pan/Tilt + WiFi Repeater| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingView more, do more, and protect more with the clarity and mobile control of D-Link’s Pan & Tilt Day/Night Network Camera (DCS-5020L). With no monthly fees the exclusive mydlink app you can view and control the camera -anywhere, anytime -on your smartphone or tablet. Experience confident clarity and control with the ultra-smooth pan/tilt and digital zoom functionality. Integrated motion and sound-sensing detection and night-vision technology provides around-the-clock surveillance. Designed with an integrated Wi-Fi extender to easily expand your wireless network. With simple installation, you’ll have an effective, affordable home or business surveillance solution up and running in no time.
feature_bullets: Ultra-smooth 340° pan and 120° tilt capability with 4x digital zoom lets you keep an eye on a larger area
26 feet of night vision allows you to see clearly even in complete darkness
Sound detection and motion sensing technology sends you automatic push alert notifications whenever a loud noise or movement is detected
View and control using the free mydlink Lite app available for iOS, Android devices and Windows Phones
Not compatible with Microsoft Edge browser

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars1,127 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Best Sellers Rank: #272 in Complete Surveillance Systems#397 in Dome Surveillance Cameras
